description: This file contains integration tests for the LanceDb vector database, including both synchronous and asynchronous operations, involving document insertion, search, existence checks, and cleanup.

classes.name: Document
classes.description: A class representing a document with name, content, and metadata.

methods.name: test_lance_db_sync_operations
methods.description: Tests for synchronous creation, insertion, search, existence checks, and deletion of LanceDb.

methods.name: test_lance_db_sync_search_types
methods.description: Tests for different search types (vector, keyword, hybrid) in LanceDb.

methods.name: test_lance_db_basic_async_operations
methods.description: Asynchronous tests for creation, insertion, search, existence, and cleanup of LanceDb.

methods.name: test_lance_db_async_operations
methods.description: Tests for concurrent asynchronous operations including batch insertions and searches in LanceDb.
